txt.en: 'My father has many sentries that patrol the outskirts of Lhan Gogledh below. These sentries are among his most trusted men, and they have been responsible for the defiling of the cairns.  \n\n'Will you seek out these sentries and drive them away from the encampment?'
'With the sentries scattered away from Lhan Gogledh, we have an opportunity to strike into the heart of the encampment and confront my father.'
Among the buildings in Lhan Gogledh, patrolling sentries watch for enemies attempting to enter the encampment.
Lhan Gogledh lies along the path north of Lhucu's hut.\n\nLhucu has asked you to seek out and defeat the sentries that patrol the outskirts of Lhan Gogledh.
Talk to Lhucu at her hut
Lhucu is at her hut, south of Lhan Gogledh.\n\nYou should inform Lhucu that the sentries have been scattered.
